text: Michael Degen (31 January 1932 â€“ 9 April 2022) was a German-Israeli actor. His career began in 1963. His best known works were Supermarket, Beyond Good and Evil and Dr. M. Degen survived the Holocaust as a child in Berlin. His father died in the Sachsenhausen concentration camp in 1940. Degen died on 9 April 2022 in Hamburg, Germany at the age of 90. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1932 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Holocaust survivors Category:Naturalized citizens of Israel Category:German movie actors Category:German television actors Category:German stage actors Category:Israeli movie actors Category:Israeli television actors Category:Israeli stage actors Category:Actors from Hamburg Category:People from Chemnitz
title: Michael Degen
